channel.title: Less OP ExoSuit - How to edit the MOD?
channel.description:
Is there a way to edit the mod so it just combines the bladeRunner and jetpack ?
With the current insane 2x speed, it makes you fly around the map like a hacker and makes things like vehicles and hypertube useless.
Just wish to have a combination of the two ingame items. Any help to achieve this is much appreciated.
Thank you.

item.title: Less OP ExoSuit - How to edit the MOD?
item.dc:creator: @Robb Rob B
item.description:
@Robb wrote:

You could use the PowerSuit mod and the PowerSuit Modules mod to make a suit with your preferred flight speed among many other options. The flight it offers is different from the vanilla jetpack, however, which might not be to your liking.

Read full topic
item.source: Less OP ExoSuit - How to edit the MOD?
